commit.message:
tree-if-conv.c: Include tree-ssa-sccvn.h.

2018-10-25  Richard Biener  <rguenther@suse.de>

	* tree-if-conv.c: Include tree-ssa-sccvn.h.
	(tree_if_conversion): Run CSE on the if-converted loop body.

From-SVN: r265489

+
+	* tree-if-conv.c: Include tree-ssa-sccvn.h.
+	(tree_if_conversion): Run CSE on the if-converted loop body.
